It sounds like you're interested in war films with a touch of intrigue. Two movies that might catch your attention are "Valkyrie" and "The Imitation Game".

In "Valkyrie", starring Tom Cruise, you'll find a gripping tale about a group of German officers plotting to assassinate Adolf Hitler during World War II. On the other hand, "The Imitation Game" stars Benedict Cumberbatch as Alan Turing, a brilliant mathematician who tries to crack the German Enigma code while grappling with his personal life during World War II. Both films explore themes of courage and moral complexity that might resonate with your interest in uneasy stories. Enjoy the watches!
